data.title: ZUK Z2 Pro is official: Snapdragon 820 and 6GB of RAM for $420
data.text:

There is no reason to buy Z2. What a pitty.

21 Apr 2016

I've got a Zuk Z1 and it is a great phone, especially the amazing battery life from the massive battery. However the Z2 seems to be missing this, so I guess I will be missing the Z2.

21 Apr 2016

another wrong configuration design from Lenovo. good job. this will help Lenovo remain in the low cost market . its sound good to me. because i seldom spend more for Samsung when i can get the value of model .

Zuk Z2-V / Lenovo Z3 pro suppose to be :

6" FHD Amoled

21MP , F1.7

6GB RAM

128 rom / 64rom

5000mah

Duo 4G sim

7.1 usb headphone socket rather 3.5mm no effect sound

Duo Speaker with at least 80db ringtone volume

Non slip back cover

Cutting edge design for put the headphone at behind the curve back cover to avoid ear pain , less oilly screen defect.

weather proof like what Lenovo A5000 doing.

if same price with Mate 8 , i dont buy.
